com.facebook.buck.android

Class FilterResourcesStep

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.android.FilterResourcesStep
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Step

    public class FilterResourcesStep
extends Object
implements Step
    This Step copies res directories to a different location, while filtering out certain resources.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FilterResourcesStep

        public FilterResourcesStep(Set<String> resDirectories,
                   File baseDestination,
                   String resourceFilter,
                   FilteredDirectoryCopier filteredDirectoryCopier,
                   FilterResourcesStep.DrawableFinder drawableFinder,
                   @Nullable
                   FilterResourcesStep.ImageScaler imageScaler)
        Creates a command that filters a specified set of directories.
        Parameters:
        resDirectories - set of res directories to filter
        baseDestination - destination directory, where copies of these directories will be placed (will be created if necessary)
        resourceFilter - filtering to perform (currently based on density; allowed values are "mdpi", "hdpi" and "xhdpi")
        imageScaler - if not null, use the FilterResourcesStep.ImageScaler to downscale higher-density drawables for which we weren't able to find an image file of the proper density (as opposed to allowing Android to do it at runtime)

    • Method Detail

      • getFilteredResourceDirectories

        public ImmutableSet<String> getFilteredResourceDirectories()
        Returns drop-in set of resource directories for the rest of the build (e.g. aapt).
        Returns:
        set of directories which, after running execute(ExecutionContext), will contain filtered copies of the resource directories passed on construction.

        Returns:
        a short name/description for the command, such as "javac". Should fit on one line.
